name: Candy Ymmy Bom Mania
description:
Candy Ymmy Bom Mania is a very addictive match 3 game. Be the most delicious and juicy fruit star that may be in this forest forest wonderland. Sweep match 3 candy bomb mania to break the level of interest in this puzzle adventure! New sweets, new blooms, more divine, more combined stars and a game mode filled with purple sugar confectionery cookie mania! Crush the sweet pastry cake with your finger, and enjoy the blasting mania!
features:
1. More than 300 challenging levels & many game props.
2. Three game modes: Arcade, Mineral, Classic
3. Sweet and delicious UI & cool animation effects.
4. Bomb candy can eliminate the candy around.
5. Color-changing candy can eliminate to any same candy.
